channel.title: Vote4cash not using mysql?
channel.description: Is there a way to add vote4cash items w/e without using MySQL frankly i hate MySQL and just wanna add a vote4cash that runs checks thru an html page or php or w/e lol basically i just wanna add a vote4cash without using MySQL at all

item.title: Vote4cash not using mysql?
item.dc:creator: @xx_matty_xx Justin Bieber
item.description:
@xx_matty_xx wrote:

We don’t know because you don’t say why you hate MySQL? SQLite? CouchDB? XML? JSON? Flat files?!

Read full topic

item.title: Vote4cash not using mysql?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“RUNE-PK, post:2, topic:539449”]What server and client are you using like the revision?[/quote]The revision isn’t going to matter much.

I would recommend using MySQL and doing it properly. Just follow a tutorial, it can’t be that hard. Then check back here if you get stuck during it. Good luck.

Read full topic
